name: Arya Stark
quotes:
[a pack of wolves surround and growl at Arya. A large direwolf appears]

Arya Stark: Nymeria?

[Arya puts her sword down]

Arya Stark: Nymeria, it's me, Arya. I'm heading North, girl. Back to Winterfell, I'm finally going home. Come with me. Come with me.

[Nymeria and the other wolves leave. Arya is left alone in disbelief]

Arya Stark: That's not you.

Hot Pie: You've been making pies?

Arya Stark: One or two.

aliases: The Maid of Tarth , Brienne the Beauty , Brienne the Blue
allegiances: House Baratheon of Storm's End , House Stark of Winterfell , House Tarth of Evenfall Hall
name: Brienne of Tarth

aliases: Brotherfucker, The bitch queen
name: Cersei Lannister
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Light of the West , Queen Dowager , Protector of the Realm , Lady of Casterly Rock , Queen Regent
quotes:
Cersei Lannister: If the Mad King's daughter takes the Iron Throne, she'll destroy the Realm as we know it. Some of you are bannermen of House Tyrell, but House Tyrell is in open rebellion against the crown. With their help, the Mad King's daughter has ferried an army of savages to our shores: mindless Unsullied soldiers who will destroy your castles and your holdfasts; Dothraki heathens, who will burn your villages to the ground, rape and enslave your women and butcher your children without a second thought. This is how Olenna Tyrell rewards centuries of service and loyalty.

[the people murmur]

Cersei Lannister: You will remember the Mad King. You remember the horrors he inflicted upon his people. His daughter is no different. In Essos, her brutality is already legendary. She crucified hundreds of noble men in Slaver's Bay, and when she grew bored of that, she fed them to her dragons.

[the people murmur]

Cersei Lannister: It is my solemn duty to protect the people and I will, but I need your help, my lords. We must stand together. All of us, if we hope to stop her.

aliases: Dany , Daenerys Stormborn , The Unburnt , Mother of Dragons , Mother , Mhysa , The Silver Queen , Silver Lady , Dragonmother , The Dragon Queen , The Mad King's daughter
name: Daenerys Targaryen
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Queen of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms , Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea , Breaker of Shackles/Chains , Queen of Meereen , Princess of Dragonstone
quotes:
Daenerys Targaryen: I swear this: If you ever betray me, I'll burn you alive.

Lord Varys: I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.

Tyrion Lannister: If we turn the dragons loose, tens of thousands will die in the firestorms.

Ellaria Sand: It's called war. If you don't have the stomach for it, scurry back into hiding.

Tyrion Lannister: I know how you wage war. We DON'T poison little girls here. Myrcella was innocent.

Ellaria Sand: She was a Lannister. There are no innocent Lannisters. My greatest regret is that Oberyn died fighting for you.

Daenerys Targaryen: [interrupts] That's enough! Lord Tyrion is Hand of the Queen, you will treat him with respect. I am not here to be Queen of the Ashes.

Olenna Tyrell: That's very nice to hear. Of course, I can't remember a queen who was better loved than my granddaughter. The common people loved her, the Nobles loved her, and what is left of her now? Ashes. Commoners, Nobles, they're all just children, really. They won't obey you unless they fear you.

Daenerys Targaryen: I'm grateful to you, Lady Olenna, for your counsel. I'm grateful to all of you, but you have chosen to follow me. I will not attack King's Landing. WE will not attack King's Landing.

aliases: Onion Knight , Davos Shorthand , Ser Onions , Onion Lord , Smuggler
allegiances: House Baratheon of Dragonstone , House Seaworth of Cape Wrath
name: Davos Seaworth
titles: Ser , Lord of the Rainwood , Admiral of the Narrow Sea , Hand of the King

name: Dickon Tarly
means_of_death: Burned alive by Drogon on the order of Daenerys Targaryen
quotes:
[Jaime approaches Randyll and Dickon Tarly]

Jaime Lannister: Lord Tarly.

[Randyll and Dickon turn to Jaime]

Randyll Tarly: Ser Jaime. I believe you know my son.

Dickon Tarly: Ser Jaime.

Jaime Lannister: Rickard... isn't it?

Dickon Tarly: Dickon.

Jaime Lannister: That's it.

allegiances: House Nymeros Martell of Sunspear , House Uller of Hellholt

quotes: Euron Greyjoy: [to Theon] Come on, you cockless coward. I have her, come and get her.

quotes: Hot Pie: [to Arya] I can't believe I thought you were a boy. You're pretty!

Hot Pie: You've been making pies?

Arya Stark: One or two.

aliases: The Kingslayer , The Lion of Lannister , The Young Lion , Cripple
name: Jaime Lannister
titles: Ser , Lord Commander of the Kingsguard , Warden of the East (formerly)
quotes: Jaime Lannister: Maybe it really is all cocks in the end.

[Jaime approaches Randyll and Dickon Tarly]

aliases: Lord Snow , Ned Stark's Bastard , The Snow of Winterfell , The Crow-Come-Over , The 998th Lord Commander of the Night's Watch , The Bastard of Winterfell , The Black Bastard of the Wall , Lord Crow
name: Jon Snow
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Lord Commander of the Night's Watch
means_of_death: Stabbed by Night’s Watch mutineers, including Alliser Thorne and Olly
quotes:
[In the crypts of Winterfell]

Jon Snow: You don't belong down here.

Petyr 'Littlefinger' Baelish: Forgive me. We haven't ever talked properly. I wanted to remedy that.

Jon Snow: I have nothing to say to you.

[Jon turns to leave]

Petyr 'Littlefinger' Baelish: Not even "thank you"? If it weren't for me you'd have been slaughtered on that battlefield. You have many enemies, my king, but I swear to you, I'm not one of them. I love Sansa... as I loved her mother.

[Jon grabs Littlefinger by the throat and slams him against the wall]

Jon Snow: Touch my sister and I'll kill you myself.

aliases: Jorah the Andal , Bear
allegiances: House Mormont of Bear Island , House Targaryen of King's Landing
name: Jorah Mormont
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6

aliases: The Red Priestess , The Red Woman , The King's Red Shadow , Lady Red , Lot Seven
name: Melisandre

aliases: Lady Nym
name: Nymeria Sand
quotes:
[at Yara's ship, the Sand Snakes talk about killing the Lannisters. Obara drinks from a wineskin]

Tyene Sand: You can't have them all. It's not fair.

Obara Sand: I'm oldest.

Tyene Sand: Mama will want Cersei for herself.

Obara Sand: She's not my mama.

Nymeria Sand: You can have Cersei. I want the Mountain.

Obara Sand: [sneers] The Mountain killed Father. He'll crush you with one hand.

Tyene Sand: Father got careless. That's what Mama says.

Obara Sand: [angrily] Will you shut up about "Mama"?

[Obara hands her wineskin to Nymeria]

Nymeria Sand: [mocking Tyene] "Mama, mama, mama".

Tyene Sand: Maybe I'll kill you both before we take King's Landing. And then I won't have to share.

[Obara and Nymeria look at each other. Nymeria throws the waterskin at Tyene]

Obara Sand: [mocking Tyene] [
